First time with unicorn

I was taking a walk in the forest when I saw a beautiful white unicorn. It was so bright and friendly. We became friends and I took it home with me. Then i realised that in fact, it was a horse with a corn glued.

Wilson the lost

It was a normal day in my life when I came across the wonderful ball I called Wilson. Since it didn't have much personality, I decided to stamp a face on it. Everything was going well, until the day we had a loud argument in the office and I had to throw it.
